**Bulk** L

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

A faint mist emanates from your skin, making you concealed for the listed duration. As usual, if you become [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) when your position is still obvious, you can't use this concealment to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=2404) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=2405).
